item.title: CVE-2022-4934|2024-08-03T01:55:46.065Z -- sophos -- sophos%20web%20appliance
item.description: A post-auth command injection vulnerability in the exception wizard of Sophos Web Appliance older than version 4.3.10.4 allows administrators to execute arbitrary code.
